value:
Finish all turns to complete a game of Pawns
of Loki.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Eremiya:
Bishop of Woe with Alfonse: Prince
of Askr on your team.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Eremiya:
Bishop of Woe on Lunatic or higher difficulty
with Eremiya: Bishop of Woe on your team.

Defeat Eremiya: Bishop of Woe at level 40
or higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Defeat Eremiya: Bishop of Woe at level 40
or higher with Eremiya: Bishop of Woe.

Clear the Grand Hero Battle against Eremiya:
Bishop of Woe on Lunatic or higher difficulty
with an all-cavalry team.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.

Defeat a foe with the My Summoner unit
in Mjölnir's Strike.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear one of the final maps in Tempest Trials.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear a battle in Røkkr Sieges.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Win Arena Duels at any difficulty.
Defeat a colorless foe with a lance ally.
Defeat a colorless foe with a blue tome ally.
Defeat a colorless foe with a blue cavalry ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 10 or higher
with a sword ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 10 or higher
with a red tome ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 10 or higher
with a red infantry ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 20 or higher
with an axe ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 20 or higher
with a green tome ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 20 or higher
with a green armored ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 30 or higher
with a colorless bow ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 30 or higher
with a colorless dagger ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level 30 or higher
with a colorless flying ally.

Defeat a colorless foe that is level
40 or higher.

Clear Paralogue 59: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 59: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 59: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

The middle children from two trios of pegasus
sisters. Their shared bonds transcend worlds.
They appear in Fire Emblem Echoes: Shadows
of Valentia / Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

A retired pegasus knight and older sister of
Thea and Shanna. Joining the bridal festival
alongside her husband, Zelot. Appears in Fire
Emblem: The Binding Blade.

A pegasus-knight trainee from Ilia. Cheerfully
participating in the bridal festival. Appears in
Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

A holy priest of St. Elimine. Enjoys spending his
time among women. Joining the bridal festival
as an observer. Appears in Fire Emblem: The
Binding Blade.

Captain of the Ilian mercenaries, who rely on
battle to earn their living. He is attending the
bridal festival alongside his wife, Juno. Appears
in Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade.

(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the
Harmonized button. This skill can be used only
once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be
used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Resonance Effect: Echoes: Shadows
of Valentia / The Binding Blade
Increases scores in Resonant Battles.
(More details can be found in the Help
messages within Resonant Battles.)

Nearby allies help her make multiple
attacks—and by using her Harmonized
Skill, she can attack four times!

Her bow does more damage based
on her Spd. With her ability to move
twice, hit-and-run tactics are ideal!

If near a couple, he increases his own
stats by +6. On odd turns, he restores
ally HP and clears their penalties!

Highly mobile and grants nearby allies
a boost—and can get up to +11 to her
own Atk when she's near an ally.

$aAccelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1).
At start of turn, if unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants "unit can move to a space adjacent
to an ally within 2 spaces" and【Triangle Attack】
to unit and allies within 2 spaces. If unit initiates
combat or if unit is within 2 spaces of an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit during combat.

【Triangle Attack】
If unit initiates combat and 2 or more allies
(excluding unit) with Triangle Attack are within
2 spaces of unit, unit attacks twice. (That turn
only. Does not stack.)

Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

Grants Atk/Def+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+4 to unit during combat.

Effective against flying foes. Grants Atk+3.
If unit initiates combat or if unit is within 2
spaces of an ally, deals damage = 20% of
unit's Spd and grants Atk/Spd+6 to unit
during combat.

Grants Atk/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat.

Grants Atk/Res+4 to allies within 2 spaces
during combat. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Res+4 to unit during combat.

If unit is within 3 spaces of two allies in a
support-partner pair (excluding unit), grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

If unit is within 3 spaces of two allies in a
support-partner pair (excluding unit), grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6 to unit during combat and
neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

$aGrants the following effects to unit and allies
from the same titles as unit for 1 turn:
【Resonance: Blades】,【Desperation】,
and "if unit initiates combat, unit makes
a guaranteed follow-up attack."

【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.

【Desperation】
Grants the following effect for 1 turn: "If unit
initiates combat, unit can make a follow-up
attack before foe can counterattack."

Grants HP+3. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 160, treats unit's
stats as 160 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+4. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 165, treats unit's
stats as 165 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5. If unit is 5★ and level 40 and
unit's stats total less than 170, treats unit's
stats as 170 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear.
Stat total calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills.)

Grants HP+5, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2. If unit is 5★,
level 40, a Legendary Hero or a Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 175, treats unit's
stats as 175 in modes like Arena. If unit is 5★,
level 40, not a Legendary Hero or Mythic Hero,
and unit's stats total less than 180, treats unit's
stats as 180 in modes like Arena.
(Higher-scoring opponents will appear. Stat
total calculation excludes any values added by
merges and skills.)

$aEnables【Canto (Rem. +1)】.

Inflicts Atk/Def-1 on foe during combat.

【Canto (Rem. +1)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move spaces = any
movement not already used that turn +1.
(If unit used a movement skill that warped
them, its remaining movement is 0.)

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger after the granted action. Unit's base
movement has no effect on movement granted.
Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy)
a distance greater than unit's remaining
movement +1.)
